H0.text: What ore is the chief source of aluminium. Corundum

H1.text: What ore is the chief source of aluminium. Cryolite

H2.text: What ore is the chief source of aluminium. Garnet

H3.text: What ore is the chief source of aluminium. Boxite

A4.text: Bauxite is the world's main source of aluminium and gallium.

A5.text: Bauxite is a sedimentary rock with a relatively high aluminium content. It is the world's main source of aluminium and gallium.

A6.text: Bauxite is a sedimentary rock with a relatively high aluminium content.

A7.text: Abrasive corundum is synthetically manufactured from bauxite.

A8.text: Cryolite was historically used as an ore of aluminium.

A9.text: Bauxite is a combination of aluminium oxide minerals such as gibbsite, boehmite and diaspore.
